highlights: Led frontend architecture, established best practices, and improved code quality through reviews, elevating engineering standards
Engineered UX solutions that increased page speed, usability, and accessibility, leading to better user engagement
Built interactive dashboards with geospatial insights to transform complex public safety data into actionable visuals
Developed secure, scalable cloud infrastructures to ensure reliable performance and protect sensitive research data
Spearheaded the new Resume Generator feature, from POC to full integration into the main application, collaborating across product, engineering, and engagement teams
Built a new onboarding flow, improving self-enrolled users by 33%
Developed high business impact components, such as the Credit Line widget and a scalable Navbar
Pioneered the implementation of Typescript and Unit testing, improving overall application trust
Implemented features such as yearly subscriptions and multiple restaurants per user, increasing company revenue by 40%
Optimized Lighthouse metrics, achieving a score of 98 for a smoother user experience and improved SEO
Responsible for maintaining and deploying the platform using Next.js, Redux, and Firebase as the primary technology stack
Led improvements to the company website and managed the design system
Optimized app performance for speed and scalability
Designed and built features that enhanced the usability and functionality of the application
